sentences.en: After all, sitting and waiting is how we made money from the subprime debacle.
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 我们如何从次贷崩溃赚钱就是坐着等待.

sentences.en: After the debacle of the war the world was never the same again.
sentences.cn: 经历了这场战争的惨败之后，世界再也不是原来的那个样子了。

sentences.en: And don't use the debacle to start a general discussion about the difficulties in your relationship.
sentences.cn: 另外,无所不能利用这次意外,对你们联系中的症结发起一场大研讨.

sentences.en: His first performance was a debacle : the audience booed him off the stage.
sentences.cn: 他的首场演出 一败涂地,观众发出嘘声把他轰下了台.

sentences.en: History will still record that the invasion and occupation have been a debacle.
sentences.cn: 历史仍然会将对伊拉克的入侵和占领视为巨大的失败.

sentences.en: It also avoid the kind of public relations debacle Detroit's fat cats endured last week.
sentences.cn: 也可以避免像底特律那些脑满肠肥的主管一样,在上周忍受完全失败的公关所带来的苦果.

sentences.en: It was a medical and political debacle, one spawned fears of flu vaccinations lingering to today.
sentences.cn: 这是一次医疗和政治的崩溃, 导致人们对流感疫苗的恐惧至今挥之不去.

sentences.en: Many men were shot or captured in the debacle.
sentences.cn: 败军在溃逃时有很多人被击毙或俘虏.

sentences.en: Razzie voters also made worst - of - the - decade picks , with John Travolta's science - fiction debacle Battlefield Earth winning worst picture.
sentences.cn: 本届金酸莓奖还特设了“十年最差”单元.约翰. 特拉沃塔出演的科幻片《地球战场》获评“十年最差影片”.

sentences.en: The Argentine debacle has important lessons to teach.
sentences.cn: 阿根廷的崩溃提供了重要的教训.
这次大会开得非常失败。

trans.tran_cn: 崩溃，瓦解，（河水的）奔溢，泛滥，[地]山崩，突然大地混乱
trans.tran_en: an event or situation that is a complete failure
